name: BardPG Prototype V0.0.2a
description:
This is an early prototype of a pixel-art action adventure game (working title: BardPG). A Zelda-like with focus on musical spells, puzzles, and loads of instruments to play. 

Game Premise:
The player is thrust into adventure, wielding musical magic to solve puzzles, defeat foes, and explore the remnants of a lost civilization known as The Bards. Delve into The Grand Instruments: massive and perilous musical structures, long dormant until the main character's use of musical magic awakens them. What purpose do they serve? Who has set these events into motion, and why?

Disclaimer: This prototype was released in 2022. I've made many improvements and changes since then. Check out the discord to keep an eye out for new builds!
